short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and share fantastic AI prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is the best tool to make the use of ChatGPT easier and more efficient for every purpose. It lessen your time creating large and long prompt that will waste a lot of minute typing. With the help of prompt templates, they give you more time to work on your other task while getting answers from ChatGPT.

1.1.0 - First published version
1.1.1 - Added export template function
1.1.2 - Database migration of the extension from Firebase to Unica Cloud.
          - Name and email ID display on the extension popup.
          - Popup modal for the multiple hint for better organization of prompt hints.
1.1.3 - Update the overall functionalities of the template lists. Instead of spreading the list on the ChatGPT page, developers made a popup modal to consolidate all of the list in one place. Also multi-liner prompt template hint popup for more flexible prompt creation feature.
1.1.4 - Added the fixes for the popup window settings page.
1.1.5 - Added prompt template functionality for Claude.
1.1.6 - Removed the template hider on Claude integration.
1.1.7 - Restructured the Multiple random prompt into Multivariate Alchemy. Done some fixing on ChatGPT and Claude usage. 
1.1.8 - ChatGPT page integration maintenance
